name: AKASH BHAWAN
description:
### Akash Bhawan
**4 student accommodation**, *decent rooms*, decent food.
- A-block is better
- Has Volleyball court
- For 1st year boys

name: RAVI BHAWAN
description:
### Ravi Bhawan
A-block with **better facilities**:
- Available for 2nd year students
- Good food
- Includes a gym
